title: That Dude in Blue (David Patterson)
description:
David Patterson (better known as That Dude in Blue) is an automotive YouTuber that focuses on driving modified cars and reporting on automotive news. 

 

Check out his channel! https://www.youtube.com/user/ThatDudeinBlue/videos

 

Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at https://www.BoxOfAwesome.com and enter the code SMOKINGTIRE at checkout. 

Get 10% off your purchase by going to https://www.PublicRec.com/TIRE 

Get your Decked Drawer System by going to https://www.Decked.com/SMOKINGTIRE and receive free shipping. 

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire 

Want shorter podcasts? Subscribe to our new CLIPS channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD4WGV-W5zD1MK4yHbNGwmw NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst
